summary: While it\'s snowing, the snow will pile up on rooves and if bothered (or if too much piles up) it will fall down.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Introduction[/b][/size]
This mod will make the snow pile up while it\'s snowing on rooves and when it\'s bothered (or if too much piles up) it will fall down on ground.
It does eventually melt down, either on rooves before it falls down or on ground, if while it falls some more piles up in the meantime, the snow on ground won\'t get bigger, it will just stay else it\'d become a mess quite soon.

[size=4][b]Mod Status[/b][/size]
Winterhold (50%) 

[size=4][b]Features[/b][/size]
Snow piling up on rooves:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34105-1-1364619042.jpg[/img]

Snow falling on ground after reaching a certain size:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34105-1-1364619163.jpg[/img]

[size=4][b]Notes on compatibility[/b][/size]
This mod is NOT compatible with any mod that edits cities in any way.


[size=4][b]Special thanks to[/b][/size]
[list]
[*]bowman2062
[*]Metal-Gear-REX  
[*]Brodual
[/list]

[size=4][b]Suggested mods[/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33886] It Rained On by Xilante [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31629] Real Shelter by Robinsage [/url]

[youtube]gXSVcuirmpk[/youtube]
author: Xilante
